content:
To normalize the provided profile data according to the specified guidelines, I'll follow the normalization instructions for each relevant field. Let's process the input profile:

### Input Profile
```json
{
  "name": "Jane Doe",
  "title": "Sr. Software Eng.",
  "location": "SF, CA",
  "key_skills": [
    "JavaScript",
    "React.js",
    "Node.js",
    "Agile Methodologies"
  ],
  "experience": [
    {
      "company": "Tech Solutions Inc",
      "title": "Software Eng.",
      "duration": {
        "start_date": "March 2018",
        "end_date": "Present",
        "date_range": "5 years 7 months"
      },
      "location": "San Francisco"
    },
    {
      "company": "Innovatech",
      "title": "Jr. Developer",
      "duration": {
        "start_date": "June 2015",
        "end_date": "February 2018",
        "date_range": "2 years 9 months"
      },
      "location": "San Francisco, CA"
    }
  ]
}
```

### Normalized Profile
```json
{
  "name": "Jane Doe",
  "title": "Senior Software Engineer",
  "location": "San Francisco, California, United States",
  "key_skills": [
    "JavaScript",
    "React",
    "Node.js",
    "Agile Methodologies"
  ],
  "experience": [
    {
      "company": "Tech Solutions Inc.",
      "title": "Software Engineer",
      "duration": {
        "start_date": "2018-03",
        "end_date": "Present",
        "date_range": "5 years 7 months"
      },
      "location": "San Francisco, California, United States"
    },
    {
      "company": "Innovatech",
      "title": "Junior Developer",
      "duration": {
        "start_date": "2015-06",
        "end_date": "2018-02",
        "date_range": "2 years 9 months"
      },
      "location": "San Francisco, California, United States"
    }
  ],
  "normalization_notes": "Standardized SF to full city name; Expanded job title abbreviations; Standardized React.js to React"
}
```

### Explanation of Changes
1. **Title Normalization**: 
   - "Sr. Software Eng." was expanded to "Senior Software Engineer".
   - "Software Eng." was expanded to "Software Engineer".
   - "Jr. Developer" was expanded to "Junior Developer".

2. **Location Normalization**:
   - "SF, CA" was expanded to "San Francisco, California, United States".
   - "San Francisco" and "San Francisco, CA" were standardized to "San Francisco, California, United States".

3. **Skills Normalization**:
   - "React.js" was standardized to "React".

4. **Company Names**:
   - Added a period to "Tech Solutions Inc" to make it "Tech Solutions Inc.".

5. **Date Normalization**:
   - Converted "March 2018" to "2018-03".
   - Converted "June 2015" to "2015-06".
   - Converted "February 2018" to "2018-02".

6. **Normalization Notes**:
   - Added notes to explain the changes made for clarity and traceability.
